leve.name: There's Sand in My Water (L)
leve.description: While crystals can oft serve as a much-needed source of potable water, when traveling to places devoid of aetherial manifestations, one must rely on existing water resourcesâ”€including those that do not always exhibit the highest of purities. The sand from the Sea of Clouds has a particular quality which allows water to drain through, removing impurities that may lead to sickness. In the wilds where filthy beasts are prone to drool and piss in watering holes, the properties of the sand are naught less than a godssend.
leve.client: Temple Knights Minister of Coin, Amianne Tristelle
